name: Tidy Textures Bathmat & Basket
description: A soft, cozy, textured bathmat and basket worked in linen stitch. The designs are easy to knit yet look impressive, with a polished, non-handmade appearance. The basket is optionally finished with leather handles, attached using leather cord. Both patterns are easy to adjust in size, if desired.
suggested_yarn: Lion Brand Wool Ease Thick & Quick
full_text: A soft, cozy, textured bathmat and basket worked in linen stitch. The designs are easy to knit yet look impressive, with a polished, non-handmade appearance. The basket is optionally finished with leather handles, attached using leather cord. Both patterns are easy to adjust in size, if desired.
